sentence: The company has faced severe pushback to their woke agenda, with parents marching on Disney and Florida Governor Ron Desantis rescinding the multinationals self-governing status in Orlando.
author: Spencer Lindquist
title: Disney Releases LGBTQ Pride-Themed Toys Marketed to Children

author: Katherine Hamilton
title: Washington School Board Director to Host Queer Youth Open Mic in Not Creepy Sex Shop
